name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr Complete Upgrade Pack
name_original: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr Complete Upgrade Pack
description:
Complete your Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor – Martyr experience with this pack that includes all additional content:
- The Prophecy expansion with a new class and campaign
- A new ranked game mode
- 12 new missions in unique game areas
- 5 pets
- 7 cosmetic items
